sentence.Network_en: This very careful attitude to money can sometimes border on meanness.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种对待金钱的过分谨慎的态度有时几近于吝啬。

sentence.Network_en: Whatever faults he may have, meanness is not one of them.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管他有什么缺点,可他没有吝啬这一缺点.

sentence.Network_en: He is above meanness and deceit.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不至于搞卑鄙和欺骗行为.
